00060 template<typename T, typename Alloc = std::allocator<T> >
00061   class host_vector
00062     : public detail::vector_base<T,Alloc>
00063 {
00064   private:
00065     typedef detail::vector_base<T,Alloc> Parent;
00066 
00067   public:
00068     // typedefs
00069     typedef typename Parent::size_type  size_type;
00070     typedef typename Parent::value_type value_type;
00071 
00074     __host__
00075     host_vector(void)
00076       :Parent() {}
00077 
00083     __host__
00084     explicit host_vector(size_type n, const value_type &value = value_type())
00085       :Parent(n,value) {}
00086 
00090     __host__
00091     host_vector(const host_vector &v)
00092       :Parent(v) {}
00093 
00097     __host__
00098     host_vector &operator=(const host_vector &v)
00099     { Parent::operator=(v); return *this; }
00100 
00104     template<typename OtherT, typename OtherAlloc>
00105     __host__
00106     host_vector(const host_vector<OtherT,OtherAlloc> &v)
00107       :Parent(v) {}
00108 
00112     template<typename OtherT, typename OtherAlloc>
00113     __host__
00114     host_vector &operator=(const host_vector<OtherT,OtherAlloc> &v)
00115     { Parent::operator=(v); return *this; }
00116 
00120     template<typename OtherT, typename OtherAlloc>
00121     __host__
00122     host_vector(const std::vector<OtherT,OtherAlloc> &v)
00123       :Parent(v) {}
00124 
00128     template<typename OtherT, typename OtherAlloc>
00129     __host__
00130     host_vector &operator=(const std::vector<OtherT,OtherAlloc> &v)
00131     { Parent::operator=(v); return *this;}
00132 
00136     template<typename OtherT, typename OtherAlloc>
00137     __host__
00138     host_vector(const device_vector<OtherT,OtherAlloc> &v);
00139 
00144     template<typename InputIterator>
00145     __host__
00146     host_vector(InputIterator begin, InputIterator end)
00147       :Parent(begin,end) {}
00148 }; // end host_vector
